data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Bhiwani, Haryana, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bhiwani, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Bhiwani who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Bhiwani, Haryana, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Bhiwani a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Raigar people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Bhiwani, Haryana, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Bhiwani, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bhiwani, Haryana, India has a population of 308,000.

We estimate Bhiwani has 3,388 people who might know Jesus, 3,737 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 300,875 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Bhiwani words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
